db:select.db:sql: SELECT events.*, status.name AS statusName, categories.name AS categoriesName, users.id AS userId, users.name, users.lastName, users.avatarUrl, event_images.* FROM (events, users_events_roles) INNER JOIN categories ON events.category_id = categories.id INNER JOIN status ON events.status_id = status.id INNER JOIN users ON users_events_roles.user_id = users.id INNER JOIN event_images ON event_images.event_id = events.id WHERE users.id = :user_id;

ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/java --- { id: payload.id, title: payload.title, description: payload.description, lat: payload.lat, lng: payload.lng, startDate: payload.startDate as String, endDate: payload.endDate as String, hidden: payload.hidden, status: { id: payload.status_id, name: payload.statusName }, category: { id: payload.category_id, name: payload.categoriesName }, user: { id: payload.userId, name: payload.name, lastName: payload.lastName, avatarUrl: payload.avatarUrl } }
